#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long


using namespace std;



int max(int a, int b,int c);
int L[501][501][501];

int lcs( char *X, char *Y,char *Z, int m, int n, int o )
{

   int i, j, k;


   for (i=0; i<=m; i++)
   {
     for (j=0; j<=n; j++)
     {
       for(k=0;k<=o;k++)
       {
           if (i == 0 || j == 0|| k==0)
         L[i][j][k] = 0;

       else if (X[i-1] == Y[j-1]&&Y[j-1]==Z[k-1])
         L[i][j][k] = L[i-1][j-1][k-1] + 1;

       else
         L[i][j][k] = max(L[i-1][j][k], L[i][j-1][k],L[i][j][k-1]);
       }
     }
   }


   return L[m][n][o];
}


int max(int a, int b,int c)
{
    return (a > b)? ((a>c)?a:c) : ((b>c)?b:c);
}


using namespace std;
char a[500],b[500],c[500];
int main()
{
    int t,al,l;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
      scanf("%s",a);
       scanf("%s",b);
        scanf("%s",c);
        al=strlen(a);
        l=lcs(a,b,c,al,al,al);
printf("%d\n",(3*(al-l)));




    }

return 0;
}
